text: Edward Charles "Ed" Nimmervoll (21 September 1947 – 10 October 2014), was an Austrian-born Australian rock music journalist, author and historian. He worked with rock magazines Go-Set (1966-1974) and Juke Magazine (1975–92) both as a journalist and as an editor. Nimmervoll died of brain cancer on 10 October 2014, at the age of 67.Notice of death of Ed Nimmervoll , 10 October 2014; accessed 10 October 2014. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Australian journalists Category:Australian writers Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:Australian historians Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia
title: Ed Nimmervoll
